pages.title: The Final Vault
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Final Vault$() is the last task a Vault Hunter awaits.$(br)This Vault tests your skills that you've accumulated over your journey with $(#033dfc)4 Gateways$() that you have enter to receive $(#033dfc)God Essences$()from each $(#033dfc)Vault God$(), carefully observing you as you navigate their $(#033dfc)final challenge$().

pages.title: Entering
pages.text: To enter the $(#033dfc)Final Vault$(), you require a $(#033dfc)Final Vault Frame$(), obtained by completing the Artifact puzzle by $(#033dfc)ordering all the Artifacts in the right order$(), and $(#033dfc)blowing it up$().$(br)Following, you need to place the $(#033dfc)Vault Frame$() as one of your portal blocks, and use a $(#033dfc)Final Vault Crystal$().

pages.title: Final Vault Crystal
pages.text: To create a $(#033dfc)Final Vault Crystal$(), right click a $(#033dfc)Vault Crystal$() with a $(#033dfc)Pog$() and fulfill its requirement.

pages.title: The Final Challenge
pages.text: $(k)Oh you think youre so smart by looking into the JSON files? no, freak, $()$(#f00)FIGURE IT OUT$()$(k), wrinting this book WAS$()$(#f00) HELL, $()$(k)experience it for yourself, see how it feels, I've been putting this book off for $()$(#f00)WEEKS $()$(k)now, $()$(#f00)SUFFER$(). $(k)$(#033dfc)also, TRANS RIGHTS !!$().
